Description: gem!Good length ball at 138 kph swings in late and beats Saha's outside edge flicking across the line on fourth stump.
good length ball angled wider on fifth stump, pokes at this and is beaten.
full and angled across eighth stump, pokes at this flat-footed and is beaten.
full on fifth stump at 139 kph, punched straight to extra cover.
good length ball on sixth stump at 132 kph, left alone.

fullish length angled across seventh stump at 136 kph and continues seaming away, Saha pokes at this flat-footed yet again and finally pays the price. Thin edge flies low at knee height to Salt taking this diving in front of first slip.
good length ball on eighth stump, left alone.
good length ball on fifth stump, defended to extra cover.
good length ball on off, defended.
good length ball on fourth stump, defended.
slower ball full toss at waist height on middle, swatted through square leg for two.
back of a length on seventh stump, cuts this firmly in front of point to the boundary.
good length ball on the stumps, punched down the ground to long-on for one.
138 kph landing full on fifth stump, punched to mid-off for none.
back of a length on fifth stump, punched behind point to the sweeper for one.
short on fifth stump at 140 kph, miscues a pull that falls well short of deep midwicket for one.
short on fourth stump, goes to pull and is through the shot too early and hit on the back shoulder with a big thud.
134 kph length ball on seventh stump, stroked on the up at a catchable height but well in front of backward point going to the cover sweeper for one.
good length ball on the wide guideline, slapped to the cover sweeper for one.
back of a length on middle and leg, punched back to Kuldeep for none.
full on fourth stump, punched to long-off for one.
good length on middle, shuffles far across to flick through midwicket for one.
full on off, punched to extra cover for none.
short and wide, slapped to the cover sweeper for one.
good length ball on fifth stump, Hardik leans back to cut to the sweeper for one.
good length ball on middle, goes back to flick to long-on for one.
Axar slides this in quicker on a good length on middle, defended back to Axar.
good length on the hips, flicked behind square leg for one.
full on sixth stump, punched to the cover sweeper for one.
back of a length on off, punched straight to extra cover for one.
fullish length outside off, sliced to the cover sweeper for one.
back of a length on fifth stump at 136 kph, punched to the cover sweeper for one.
length ball on sixth stump seams away after being angled in and beats the drive.
137 kph delivery lands full on seventh stump, driven along the ground to long-off for one.
short on the body, shuffles across and tucks a short arm jab pull well behind deep square leg to find the rope.
good length ball on sixth stump, punched just wide of the diving effort at extra cover to long-off for one.
good length ball on fifth stump, punched to cover for none.

short on sixth stump, slices a cut in front of backward point but it is backspinning away sharply from Rossouw racing to his left along the rope from sweeper. He dives to try to keep this in play but it comes off his hands and continues to the rope anyway.
good length ball on the stumps, flicked away for one.
short on off, Manohar miscues a pull that dribbles well short of long-on for one.
back of a length on off, goes back to punch to long-on for one.
fullish length ball on seventh stump, slaps this to Rossouw at cover sweeper for one.
good length ball on fifth stump, prodded into the covers for one.
short on middle, laces a pull firmly through square leg and finds the rope. The blue flags are waving fiercely in the crowd.
back of a length on middle, defended.
full on middle, driven to long-on for one.
back of a length on middle, punched to long-on for one.

ful on fifth stump, punched firmly to mid-off for a tight single but a rushed and unnecessary overthrow at the non-striker's stumps is wide (and they wouldn't have come close to getting Hardik out anyway) to allow for a second on an overthrow.
good length on off, Manohar sits back to swat this over wide mid-on for one.
full on leg stump, flicked to wide long-on for a singleto bring up a 44-ball half-century. Just a gentle hand wave from Hardik to acknowledge the milestone, no bat raise. The job is not done.
short outside leg, the ball sticks in the wicket a bit and Manohar is way out in front of a pull that hits him in the ribs.
short again on middle and leg, this time Manohar connects with a pull to deep midwicket for one.
117 kph quicker ball yanked short on the legs, pulled to deep midwicket along the ground for one.
another quicker ball lands short on the legs, flicked in the air short of Warner charging in from long-on for one.

Manohar's struggle comes to an end. Length ball on off stump at 139 kph, yet another attempted pull is miscued but this one finally has enough pace on it off the bat to reach a boundary fielder. Aman jogs in 10 yards off the rope at long-on for a basic chest high catch.
back of a length on fifth stump, pushed gently past the ring fielder chasing after it and Hardik wanted two after jogging for most of the first run but Tewatia wisely says no.
yorker on off at 139 kph, jammed out back to the bowler for none.

140 kph thigh high full toss on the wide guideline, Hardik tries to place this with a firm punch wide of the cover sweeper but picks him out for only a single. Should have been a free boundary but Hardik can't capitalize on it.
125 kph slower short ball on middle, Tewatia plays a short-arm paddle pull to deep square leg for one.
knee high full toss on the wide guideline again at 139 kph, just another firm punch that backs out backward point for a diving stop to keep it to one.
142 kph yorker on off, jammed out to Nortje.
144 kph full on leg stump, whipped out to deep midwicket for a frantic two.
yorker follows Hardik backing away from leg stump and he digs this out to long-on for one.
knee high full toss on the legs at 148 kph, Tewatia smokes a six pulling this flat over the deep square leg fielder.
Tewatia magic!Full in the slot on leg stump at 148 kph, Tewatia stays stationary in the crease and clears the front leg to slaughter this high over wide midwicket landing 20 meters beyond the rope.

hat-trick of sixes for Tewatia over the leg side rope! Off Nortje too!Knee high full toss on fourth stump as Nortje finally corrects his line wider, but Tewatia was anticipating the line being dragged that far and shuffles way outside off for the first time to get in line before smoking this with a pull high and deep over wide long-on for an 88-meter strike.

ankle high full toss on eighth stump, miscues a slice high toward Nortje running in from cover sweeper. If it was a World Cup Final, he'd have put in a dive for a catch that would also have been a dot ball but instead he lets it land at his feet and two runs are taken.
full and wide, sliced behind point for a casual one to put Tewatia on strike.

full and wide yorker just inside the guidelines, Tewatia clears the front leg and misses a wild heave to this 143 kph delivery.Tewatia goes to DRSclaiming this should be a wide for a bonus run and ball, but he's going to lose this. It was comfortably inside the wide guideline. Review lost.

119 kph slower length ball on fifth stump, Tewatia tries to muscle this over the leg side again but miscues it off the splice fluttering gently to Rossouw five yards inside the ring at extra cover and he backpedals a few steps for a simple head high catch.

dropped!Low and wide, Rashid slams this with immense timing and power to Rossouw at cover on the ring who flies to his right and makes a driving stop to knock this down and turns four into two. Technically a dropped chance too at knee height which would have officially sealed the match. But they take two runs. A six will force a super over...

142 kph knee high full toss on the wide guideline, Rashid tries to muscle this over the leg side but flubs this slicing it high over backward point for just a single.Last place Delhi have clawed back in the most extraordinary way to knock off the league-leaders and defending IPL champs by five runs.
good length ball on fourth stump at 137 kph, punched to mid-off for none.
full on the legs at 139 kph, flicked to the deep square leg boundary.
134 kph good length ball on middle and leg, defended to mid-off for none.
short on fifth stump at 140 kph, pulled off the front foot with disdain through wide mid-on to the rope.
short and wide on eighth stump at 137 kph, slices a cut high over backward point in swashbuckling style and it bounces just short of the rope before thudding into the foam triangle.
back of a length on sixth stump angled in before seaming away and sucks Hardik into poking at this before he is beaten.

half-volley sliced straight to cover!Nortje channels the first ball wicket to start the match by Shami to Salt! This was sent down on seventh stump and Gill opens the face to drive this toward point but it is spliced low to cover at knee height and the catch is taken lunging forward.
back of a length on off at 148 kph, defended.
back of a length on off, flicked into the leg side for none.
back of a length on off at 145 kph, defended off the back foot to mid-on.
back of a length on off at 143 kph, flicked to midwicket for none.
150 kph delivery lands back of a length on the hips, flicked through midwicket for two.
fullish length ball at 137 kph, punched to mid-off for none.
good length ball angled in toward off stump at 139 kph, defended off an inside edge flicking the pads toward backward point for one.

139 kph good length ball on middle and off, flicks this with supreme timing through wide midwicket, Nortje gives a clumsy feet first slide along the rope trying to save this but it eludes him to the rope.
full on middle, driven firmly but straight to mid-on for none.
back of a length on fifth stump, defended to the off side for none.

bullseye!119 kph slower ball foxes Shankar flicking across the line too early. It's a knuckle ball that would make Tim Wakefield and Charlie Hough proud landing very full on off stump line before cannoning into middle and off halfway up.
back of a length on fifth stump, defended to the off side.
back of a length on middle and leg at 146 kph, defended to midwicket for none.
short on the body at 142 kph, shuffles inside the line and pulls this flat along the ground between the keeper and short fine leg to the rope.
back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers for none.
back of a length on middle, flicked into square leg for one.
back of a length on leg stump at 142 kph, defended to point for none.
full on fifth stump, Hardik pushes at this and is beaten.
full on off, punched past the non-striker to long-off for one.
full on middle and leg, defended to cover.

bullseye!Bowled behind the legs after an audacious shuffle across! Miller tries to play a release shot walking all the way across his stumps to scoop over fine leg and the early dot ball pressure results in a third-ball duck as middle and off stump are pinged back.
good length ball on middle, defended to midwicket.
short on the stumps, pulled straight to short fine leg for none.
good length ball slanted in on fourth stump, defended to Axar.
full on fourth stump, punched to long-off for one.
good length ball on fourth stump, punched to the cover sweeper for one.
good length ball on fifth stump, defended to extra cover.
back of a length on middle, punched back to Axar fielding in front of the non-striker.
full on middle, whipped straight to midwicket for none.
full on fourth stump, driven to long-off for one.
back of a length on fifth stump, defended to backward point.
full on sixth stump, driven to long-off for one.
full on fifth stump, prodded in front of backward point for one.
full outside leg stump, goes to sweep and misses as the ball spins off the glove ricocheting into the helmet.
full and wide, tapped in the gap between cover and extra cover for one.
short on the legs, Manohar picks the length early and carts a pull high over backward square leg landing 79 meters away.
back of a length on sixth stump, tapped to backward point for none.
good length ball on sixth stump, prodded in front of cover for one.
back of a length on fifth stump, punched wide of the cover sweeper for two.
good length ball on off, tapped to backward point for none.
good length ball on fifth stump, defended to backward point for none.
